basics.name: Howard Roark
basics.label: Full-stack Web Developer
basics.summary: I am a full-stack web developer with nearly 10 years experience. I have worked on projects of all different sizes for companies large and small. I really enjoy learning from new people and take pride in my work.

work.summary: My understanding of the complete web "stack" allows me to adapt to any problem.  I am comfortable working with old and new systems and always strive to make improvements wherever I can.  I am most comfortable in an agile setup and am able to prototype ideas quickly so that decisions can be made around them.
